pages.text: The Soul Container Rune is a rune that is used to define the target player of a ritual. It is used in combination with the $(l:manaweave_and_runes:ritual_anchors/novice_ritual_anchor) Ritual Anchor $() to define the player in which the ritual will affect. $(2br)Using it is relatively simple. Just right click a player while being unnoticed to steal a tiny fragment of their soul. You can also just right click to capture your own.
